#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	long long endpoint[16];
	endpoint[0] = 1;
	endpoint[1] = 10;
	endpoint[2] = 190;
	//endpoint[3] = 2890;
	long long val = 900;
	for(long long i = 3 ; i < 16 ; i++){
		endpoint[i] = endpoint[i-1] +  (val * i);
		//printf("%lld \n",endpoint[i]);
		val = val * 10;
	}
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
		long long n , k ;
		scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&k);
		long long idx = -1;
		for(int i = 0 ; i < 16 ; i++){
			if(endpoint[i] > k){
				idx = i;
				break;
			}
		}
		long long address = k - endpoint[idx-1];
		long long dist = address / (idx);
		long long pos = address % (idx);
		long long num = (long long)pow(10,idx-1) + dist;
		long long  counter = idx;
		//printf("%lld %lld %lld %lld\ %lld \n",address,dist,pos,num,idx);
		while(num > 0){
			long long digit = num % (long long)10;
			if(counter == (pos+1)){
				printf("%lld\n",digit);
				break;
			}
			num = num / (long long)10;
			counter--;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
